department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Replacement, installation and repair services for several departments
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), is issuing this REQUEST FOR STANDING OFFERS (RFSO) to obtain offers from Offerors to provide replacement, installation and repair services to several departments. All the details related to this request are found in the solicitation.
duration_in_months: There was no information given to calculate the duration.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4139026072-Doc4139076940
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4139026072
* **Publication Date:** August 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 19, 2023, 14:00:00 hours
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** October 31, 2025

## Description of Goods and Services

Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing a Request for Standing Offers for the provision of replacement, installation, and repair services for garage doors. The scope of work includes the replacement, installation, and repair of garage doors for various departments.

## Type of Procedure

* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offers
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Regions of Operation

The service will be performed in the province of Quebec, excluding the National Capital Region.

## Notice Details

* **Notice URL:**  <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17119891?extsite=MTcxMTk4OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* **Contact Information:** Fahad Zanoun, [fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Excluded Countries

This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).
